reviews.review_msg: It takes a little while to understand his accent for a few words but it is bad. Took me about two weeks to understand him completly.

most interesting accent i've ever heard.
 nice person but... i think his accent is harder to understand than the course material.

yeah ... i think he should learn to pronouce his English before teaching ... I highly recommand him that he should find a pronoucation teacher to correct his pronouciation!!! the midterms are ok .. but the final is super hard!!!

Easy midterms, ridiculously hard final. With scaling it was possible to have 45% and get a solid C. Scaling was more for lower marks (2 letter grades) and less for higher marks (a single letter grade). Easy to pass, hard to get a high mark.
His notes are nothing like his test questions. And extremely hard final exam.
his notes are hard to follow especially when you come to prepare for exams. he should practice more on his english and simplify his speech
Yah.. he needs to learn English before teaching math (or any other courses). And his handwritting needs to improve too, somehow I can't read what he writes for most of the time. ><"

He should learn english before teaching math...It should be manditory to take english before teaching...jeez. Examples:sin-sinus, cosin-cosinus,etc. determine-deetermine,subtract-substract,calculus-calcouluus,comparison-compilation, and the list goes on..
